titles.title: To authorize the appointment of Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force (Retired), to the grade of major general on the retired list.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Total Force.

bill.summary: 11/14/2003--Introduced. Authorizes the President to appoint Brigadier General Charles E. Yeager, United States Air Force (retired), to the grade of major general on the Air Force retired list.
